name: Mitsis Blue Domes Resort & Spa

reviews.text: We have just returned from 2 weeks at the Blue Domes and our experience has been amazing. Could not fault any aspect of it. All the staff are very friendly and willing to help. The choice of food is fantastic. If you did not want to go to the main restaurant every night then there was the option to book either the Mexican, Greek, Asian or Italian restaurants down near the beach. You have to book a table two nights before at the online booking system next to the main restaurant starting at 10.00pm but as we were Thomas Cook customers we were allowed to go straight to guest relations and book there without queuing which was excellent. There was also the other bars around the pool bar which did Sushi, Pita, Burger, Beeraria, Ouzerie and the Pastry corner, these were all open from 12.30 to 7.30 but the Pastry corner alwasy stayed open till midnight in case you wanted that crepe or ice cream after the entertainment.
reviews.title: What an amazing holiday

reviews.text: The entertainment was excellent could not fault the animation team they were really friendly.
reviews.title: The loveliest holidays

reviews.text: The resort is on a bit of a hill which we did not find too difficult being a young family but if you did struggle there were golf type buggies which you could call to take you wherever you wanted to go.
reviews.title: Overall great family resort.

reviews.text: The grounds are stunning and are kept clean and tidy and there were always gardeners and maintenance people keeping it looking in top condition.
reviews.title: Very pleased with the animation team
Worried for no reason at all due bad reviews!
reviews.text: The rooms are well equipped and lovely and clean and you are provided with a mini bar which is stocked up every day which contains bottled water, beer, bottled fizzy drinks etc.
Best holiday ever!!!
reviews.title: ***Fantastic holiday in Mitsis Blue Domes***

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I have never been in nicer hotel than the Mitsis Blue Domes.
reviews.title: A very stylish hotel, worthy of its 5 stars.

reviews.text: The Hotel is located on hills, with a fantastic sea view! Beautiful sea with clear water and enough sunlounger for everyone.
reviews.title: Best holiday we have ever been to thanks to the animation team.

reviews.text: Awesome hotel with all the fantastic pools. The food was great and very deliciouse.
reviews.title: Still loving it 3 years on!

reviews.text: The LED light by night is incredible!
reviews.title: A fab holiday

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This was our first time at Blue Domes, and it did not disappoint. We've spent years at these family, all inclusive resorts, but this one certainly one of the best in its class.
reviews.title: One of the Best In Class

reviews.text: Opened in 2010, the complex is fresh, clean and spacious. Many of the rooms share their own pools, which is great, and the large "public" pools are placed the entire length of the complex. There are 10 restaurants, some you need to book in advance and others specialise, with choices including Greek, Sushi, Burger, German, Italian, Aisian and Mexican. The large main dining room offers the usual fare, with a large and varied international buffet, and has seating inside and out, overlooking the sea and nearby islands.
reviews.title: Sewage smell and overbooking

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: There's a large animation team entertaining day and night, and a large private beach and beach bar.
reviews.title: AMAZING holiday!

reviews.text: The room was very good also, well appointed, though we only had BBC World News and the Fashion Channel in english. Free wifi helped make up for it. We had a terrace leading directly out onto a pool shared with other rooms in our block.
reviews.title: Better than expected

reviews.text: The local bus and tax service are good, running directly from the hotel to nearby Kardemena (€1.80pp single bus or €10 single taxt) or Kos town itself (€3.20pp single bus).
reviews.title: Greedy hotel company with no regard for their customers
After great expectations, a bit of a disappointment!
reviews.text: There are many great parts to this hotel and resort, including the choice of restaurants and pools, the downsides unfortunately really caused some issues.

Myself and my family booked a two week stay at the Mitsis Blue domes in January, and after reading a number of the recent Tripadvisor reviews, were keeping our figures crossed that we wouldn't be some of the unlucky holidaymakers that suffer from the dreaded Mitsis room 'overbooking'.
reviews.title: We love animation team!!!

reviews.text: Unfortunately this wasn't the case!!
reviews.title: Hotel, friendly staff

reviews.text: For the first two nights of our stay, after booking a family room (with a separate 2 bedroom annex for the kids) we spent the first two night all sleeping on three single beds that had been pushed together. As you can imagine we didn't get much sleep those first two nights.
reviews.title: Best holiday!!!

reviews.text: The next day we then went searching for the elusive beach towels....The hotel issues beach towels from two main points in the resort, which open at 10.30. By 11.00, both had completely run out of clean towels so we made do that day with just drip drying (it was very warm).
reviews.title: Fantastic holiday, marvellous hotel, don't be put off by bad reviews?

aka: Mitsis Blue Domes Resort And Spa
